metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7903 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Dotclear before 2.10.3, when the Host header is not part of the web server routing process, allows remote attackers to modify the password reset address link via the HTTP Host header.

criterions.comment: dotclear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
